reuters.title: WERNER ENTERPRISES <WERN> OFFERS TWO MLN SHARES
reuters.body: Werner Enterprises Inc said it filed a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission covering a public offering of two million shares of common stock. The underwriters will be led by Alex, Brown and Sons Inc, along with the Robinson-Humphrey Co Inc, the company said. The company said it will sell 800,000 shares, while 1,200,000 shares will be sold by five selling stockholders. Reuter 
